finitefields

Class ByteField

  • java.lang.Object
    • finitefields.ByteField

  • public class ByteField
extends java.lang.Object
    An optimized implementation for Finite Fields of order 256 or less, via byte-indexing of the field elements, and table lookups for the arithmetic operations. This class is written for situations where one has many objects that are composed of field values in some way, and is performing many operations over the field (e.g. constructing Cayley graphs for matrix groups over finite fields, where the field order needs to be small for the groups to have order less than five million).
    Author:
    pdokos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteField(short p, java.util.List<java.lang.Short> coeffs)
      Constructor for a ByteField object, invoked by specifying a short integer prime &le 256 for the prime base field, and a monic irreducible polynomial (in the form of a List of its coefficients) over the field of p elements by which the field extension is defined.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ByteField

        public ByteField(short p,
         java.util.List<java.lang.Short> coeffs)
        Constructor for a ByteField object, invoked by specifying a short integer prime &le 256 for the prime base field, and a monic irreducible polynomial (in the form of a List of its coefficients) over the field of p elements by which the field extension is defined.
        Parameters:
        p - any short integer prime &le 256.
        coeffs - a List<Short> representing the coefficients, starting with the constant term and ending with that of the next to largest order term, of a monic irreducible polynomial over the field of p elements. The value of p^(coeffs.size()) must be less than or equal to 256.

      • getField

        public static ByteField getField(short q)
        A static convenience method for creating a finite field of order less than or equal to 256.
        Parameters:
        q - any short integer prime power less than or equal to 256.
        Returns:
        a ByteField object modeling the field of q elements.

      • getPrimeField

        public static ByteField getPrimeField(short p)
        A static convenience method for creating a prime field.
        Parameters:
        p - any short integer prime less than 256.
        Returns:
        a ByteField object modeling the field of p elements.

      • getQuadExtension

        public static ByteField getQuadExtension(short p)
        A static convenience method for creating a degree 2 extension of a prime field.
        Parameters:
        p - any short integer prime less than 128.
        Returns:
        a ByteField object modeling the field of p elements.
